message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this amazing product. I believe it's a game-changer and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $750,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better price anywhere else.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I would like to propose a price of $650,000 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $725,000. It's a fair price considering the product's value and the benefits it will bring to your business. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I get a good return on my investment.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $675,000 for the product.

I understand that you're trying to negotiate, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'm offering $700,000 for the product. It's the best I can do, and I think it's still a great deal for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $680,000 for the product.

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to give a bit more, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good return on my investment. I'm offering $690,000 for the product. It's my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I understand your perspective, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $685,000 for the product.

I'm getting close to walking away from the deal, Bob. I'm willing to give you one more chance to meet me in the middle. I'm offering $695,000 for the product. If you can't accept this offer, I'm afraid I'll have to move on.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $690,000 for the product.
